summary: Project 7: The Lucky Crypto Universe - Project 7 aims to bring fortune and prosperity to all who believe in the magic of 7. The tokenomics include a total supply of 7,777,777 tokens with a lucky tax of 7%. The roadmap includes phases such as website launch, whitepaper launch, and partnerships. The team consists of Flora, Liliana, Carlo, Alex, and Hector. The process to buy Lucky 7 involves transferring BNB to a Metamask wallet and connecting to Pancakeswap.
proposal:
Hello Lucky 7 community! 🍀

Ever felt like the universe is on your side? Well, we've got some tools that might just make you feel that way. We're a one-stop-shop for B2B tools, and we've got something that might tickle your fancy.

1. 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY): Create your own Lucky 7 DEX based on Uniswap V2. Customize it to your heart's content. And the best part? It's a revenue share tool, so you don't have to pay a dime upfront!

2. 🎰 Lottery: Why not add a blockchain-based lottery to your lucky universe? Set your own fees and let the games begin on ETH, BSC, or Polygon.

3. 🪙 Wallet: Create a multicurrency wallet for your community. It supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, and of course, your Lucky 7 tokens.

4. 🌾 Farming: Attract more investments by offering rewards through ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming.

5. 🗳 DAO: Let your community have a say in the future of Lucky 7. Create governance and proposals for your token.

6. 🌉 CrossChain: Connect your universe with others by creating an EVM compatible blockchain bridge.

7. 🚀 IDOFactory - Launchpad: Launch your own IDO pools and token locking with our Launchpad solution.

Remember, it's not about playing the game, it's about creating it. Interested? Drop us a line. Check out our demos at https://t.me/onoutdemos. 

May the luck of the 7 be with you! 🍀
